name: Pep-zh
body:
### PEP 0 -- Python增强提议(Python Enhancement Proposals)目录

#### Introduction 简介
这篇PEP包含了所有PEP的链接。PEP编号是由PEP作者自己分配的，编号一旦被分配就再也不会改变[1]。

#### Key 类型

    S - Standards Track PEP
    I - Informational PEP
    P - Process PEP

    A - Accepted proposal
    R - Rejected proposal
    W - Withdrawn proposal
    D - Deferred proposal
    F - Final proposal
    A - Active proposal
    D - Draft proposal
    S - Superseded proposal

#### Index by Category 分类
| 类型 | 编号 | 标题 | 作者 |
|------|------|-----|------|
|P|[1](https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0001/)|PEP Purpose and Guidelines|Warsaw, Hylton, Goodger, Coghlan|
|P|[4](https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0004/)|Deprecation of Standard Modules|Cannon, von Löwis|
|P|[5](https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0005/)|Guidelines for Language Evolution|Prescod|
|P|[6](https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0006/)|Bug Fix Releases|Aahz, Baxter|
|P|[7](https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0007/)|Style Guide for C Code|GvR|
|p|[8](https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0008/)|Style Guide for Python Code|GvR, Warsaw, Coghlan|
|P|[9](https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0009/)|Sample Plaintext PEP Template|Warsaw|
|P|[10](https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0010/)|Voting Guidelines|Warsaw|
|P|[11](https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0011/)|Removing support for little used platforms|von Löwis, Cannon|
|P|[12](https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0012/)|Sample reStructuredText PEP Template|Goodger, Warsaw|


#### References 参考
[1] [PEP 1](https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0001/): PEP Purpost and  Guidelines
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
